## Course Overview

<br>
[<img src="https://github.com/RockefellerUniversity/RU_ATACseq/workflows/R-CMD-check-bioc/badge.svg">](https://github.com/RockefellerUniversity/RU_ATACseq/actions?query=workflow%3AR-CMD-check-bioc)

This course introduces plotting and importing Genomic Heatmaps in R.

The course consists of 1 sections on plotting and importing Genomic Heatmaps in R.<br>
Each section is presented as HTML presentations or single page document. Exercises and answer sheets are included after all subsections to practice techniques and provide future reference examples. 

Course material and exercises are available to view as rendered HTML at https://rockefelleruniversity.github.io/RU_ATACseq/.
All material is available to download under GPL v2 license.
